ovdesc.p: This application stores T24 generated records with details of documents tracked for an authorized application record.

desc.p: ID of the document record either in CUST.DOCUMENT or TRANS.DOCUMENT tables, tracked during the application record (whose ID is specified in the ID of this record) input, on the date specified in the ID of this record.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

The ID of the record is of the format "Date*Application Mnemonic*Application ID", where Date is the Bank Date of application record input, Application Mnemonic is as specified in DM.APPLICATION.INFO and Application ID is the ID of the Application record for which documents have been tracked.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
